name: Snake (itch) (Bunslake)
description:
It's snake, nothing more, nothing less.

Move using WASD keys, pause with esc. Eat food to grow and beat your highscore ^^

This is the first time I've made a game from scratch instead of just the art!

  •  The game is entirely based onthis tutorial
  • The art is heavily inspired by faunwood
  • The music was made using the DAW Cakewalk and was heavily inspired by "Inside Deku Tree" from Ocharina of Time
